comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: CAPT. F.L. CHAPIN OF THE WYOMING DIES; Commander of Flagship of Atlantic Fleet, dies of Bright's disease query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9502E0D6103FE6... Bright's disease is a historical classification of kidney diseases that would be described in modern medicine as acute or chronic nephritis.
